name: Trix and the Horny Tower
description:
Trix's husband is indebted to the merchants' guild and the missions she carries out in exchange for money aren't enough to save him. However, everything changes when they discover that the King of Oleryana will pay a good reward to the warrior who ends the curse of the Horny Tower.

Happy with the opportunity, Trix embarks on this new mission but she is surprised by an unknown wizard who curses her with an insatiable desire. He swears that one day they will get married.

Will Trix abandon her husband? Will Trix be able to stay faithful or is the wizard's prediction right?

Features:

  • Classic J-RPG Gameplay:
  • Lust mechanics;
  • A Horny Tower with unique puzzles, mechanics, and H-scenes;
  • Unique monsters (everyone has its own behavior);
  • Immersive Story and Characters;
  • Side Quests;
